entries: A normal gem becomes an Activated Gem with a two-turn timer. The timer counts down by 1 at the start of your turn. If any player matches your Investigate Gem or its timer reaches zero, you draw a card.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Invisibility (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can become {@condition invisible} for 1 round.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Invisible Hand
entries: The thief gains additional benefits when it casts {@spell mage hand}. For a creature to notice the hand or the tasks the hand is performing, it must succeed on a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Invoke Duplicity
entries: The <$name$> creates a perfect illusion of itself that lasts for 1 minute or until it loses its concentration, as if concentrating on a spell. The illusion appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of <$name$>. As a bonus action, <$name$> can move the illusion up to 30 feet to a space within 120 feet of <$name$> that it can see. Additionally, when both <$name$> and its illusion are within 5 feet of a creature that can see the illusion, <$name$> has advantage on attack rolls against that creature.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Iron Boots
entries: While moving, the <$name$> has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Jungle Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in jungle terrain.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Keen Tracker
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill survival}) checks to track prey.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Kicking Retreat
entries: If the <$name$> attacks with its hooves, it can take the Disengage action as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Landwalk
entries: <$name$> can move across and climb {type of} surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of {type of terrain} doesn't cost it extra moment, leaves no tracks, creature may also choose to hide in light cover in that sort of terrain.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Leader
entries: Your Leader creature Exiles your Token creatures of the specified subtype and converts each one into a reinforcement of itself. This effect occurs both as the Leader enters play, and as you play any Token creatures of the specified subtype.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Life Eater
entries: A creature reduced to 0 hit points from damage dealt by the <$name$> dies and can't be revived by any means short of a wish spell.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Lifelink
entries: Regain HP equal to ½ of the damage it deals in attacks each round.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Lifesense
entries: A <$name$> notices and locates all living creatures within {60} ft., without effort or error, and it knows how close to death the creature is.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Light Hypersenstitivey
entries: <$name$> takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Lightfooted
entries: The <$name$> can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Lightless Depths
entries: A <$name$> is immune to the pressure effects of the deep ocean.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Like Calls To Like
entries: The <$name$> knows if a creature within 30 feet of it is similarly-aligned or not.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The <$name$> can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: The <$name$> can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The <$name$> can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within {120} feet of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Liquid Form
entries: The <$name$> can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can also move through a space as narrow as l inch wide without squeezing.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Living Construct
entries: The <$name$> is immune to disease. It does not need to eat or breathe, but can ingest food and drink if it wishes.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Low Cunning
entries: <$name$> can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Madness
entries: All of your cards with Madness gain their specified amount of mana whenever a card is Discarded (not Exiled) from your hand. A card with Madness is immune to being Discarded itself.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Magic Arrows
entries: <$name$>'s ranged weapon attacks are magical.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Magic Attacks
entries: <$name$>'s weapon attacks are magical.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Magic Immunity
entries: The <$name$> is immune to damage from spells. It has advantage on saving throws against all other magical effects.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Magic Proof
entries: <$name$> automatically succeeds on saving throws against spells and magic effects unless it chooses not to.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Magic Ranged Weapons
entries: <$name$>'s ranged weapon attacks are magical.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Magma Armor
entries: When the <$name$> is below half of its maximum hp, its body cools and AC increases by +4.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Manifestation
entries: As an action, a <$name$> can transport itself from any point on the Material Plane to another point within its defined area or within 300 feet of the artifact to which it is bound. A <$name$> can also lurk on the Negative Plane, prepared to manifest on the Material Plane if certain conditions are met, such as trespassers entering the area the <$name$> is doomed to guard. A <$name$> can't attack or move in the round in which it manifests, it is effectively {@condition stunned} until the start of its next turn. When it manifests, it appears as a shifting cloud of shadows that coalesces into its cloaked and hooded form. Until the start of its next turn (the round after it manifests), its shifting form has the effect of a blur spell.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Mariner
entries: The <$name$> can hold its breath underwater for twice as long and has proficiency with navigator's tools. The <$name$> is also naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Massive
entries: The <$name$> is not affected by difficult terrain  and can move into spaces already occupied by Large or smaller creatures. When it does so, creatures in those spaces must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d20}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.  <$name$> can't dash. Attacks that push, trip, or grapple are made with disadvantage against a flab giant.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Massive Swing
entries: The <$name$> can hit up to 2 Medium targets, or 3 Small or smaller targets within 5 feet of each other with each greataxe attack. A separate attack roll is made for each target.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Master of Disguise
entries: A <$name$> in a prepared disguise has advantage on Charisma ({@skill Deception}) checks made to pass as a another similar creature.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Megamorph {@recharge 5}
entries: <$name$> has an alternate form; as a bonus action they can polymorph into {forms (not greater than 1/4th the primary form's CR}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Meld
entries: <$name$> if adjacent to {@monster name} can take an held action to allow {@monster name} to merge together and on its action to create  {@monster Merged_Creaturename}

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Menace
entries: Unless the attacker has an ally within 10ft of <$name$>, their attack rolls are at disadvantage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Mimicry
entries: The <$name$> can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc #} Wisdom (Insight) check.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Mobility
entries: Opponents has disadvantage on attacks of opportunity attacks against <$name$>.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Mock the Dying
entries: Death saving throws made within 60 feet of the <$name$> have disadvantage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Monumental Stupidity
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Mounted Combatant
entries: While mounted, <$name$> has advantage on melee attack rolls against unmounted creatures that are smaller than its mount, and can force an attack targeted at its mount to target itself instead.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Multi limbed
entries: The <$name$> can draw multiple weapons as a free object interaction action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: <$name$> can take one reaction per turn, rather than only one per round. It also has advantage on saving throws against being  {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Natural Swimmer
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks made to swim.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Nature's Fury
entries: When the <$name$> casts a druid spell, it can make one natural attack as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Necromancer Friendly
entries: <$name$> can be created using a create undead spell. For each creature, an appropriate corpse or corpses is required rather than the type suggested in the spell's description.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Negative Energy Aura
entries: Creatures within 5 feet of the <$name$> can't regain hit points.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Nimble
entries: The <$name$> can take the {@action disengage} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Nimble Action
entries: On each of its turns, the <$name$> can use a bonus action to take the {@action Dash} or {@action Disengage} action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Nimbleness
entries: The <$name$> can move through the space of any creature size Medium or larger.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Noxious Webs
entries: A creature that starts its turn in a space flled with or {@condition restrained} by webbing created by <$name$> (either by her Web attack or spell) takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Ooze Cube
entries: The <$name$> takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the <$name$>'s Engulf and has disadvantage on the saving throw.,Creatures inside the <$name$> can be seen but have total cover.,A creature within 5 feet of the <$name$> can take an action to pull a creature or object out of the <$name$>. Doing so requires a successful {@dc 12} Strength check, and the creature making the attempt takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage.,The <$name$> can hold only one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures inside it at a time.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Outsize Strength
entries: While grappling, the <$name$> is considered to be Medium. Also, wielding a heavy weapon doesn't impoose disadvantage on its attack rolls.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Overbearing Pack
entries: <$name$> has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to shove a creature if at least one of <$name$>'s allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn't incapacitated.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Overload
entries: <$name$> attacks effect not just the target but also creatures adjacent to the target

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Padded Feet
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks to move silently.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Perfect Record
entries: <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Persist
entries: If damage reduces the <$name$> to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the <$name$> drops to 1 hit point instead.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Phasing
entries: As a bonus action on its turn, the <$name$> may become etheral as a bonus action until its next round.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Planar Travel
entries: <$name$> can cast plane shift after spending one hour in uninterrupted meditation.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Plant Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Poisonous
entries: <$name$> attacks additionally inflict the {@condition poisoned|poisoned} condition unless the target saves Constitution {@dc 14}, if they save target instead takes an addition 4 {@damage 1d8} poison damage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Poor Depth Perception
entries: The <$name$> has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Potent Poison
entries: The <$name$> poison affects corporeal undead who are otherwise immune to poison.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Pounce
entries: If the creature moves at least {20} feet straight toward target creature and then hits it with a {specific} attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is {@condition prone}, <$name$> can make one {specific} attack against it as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Powerful Charge
entries: If <$name$> moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a {specific} attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the <$name$> can make one attack with its {specific} against it as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Premonition
entries: The<$name$> has advantage on initiative checks and is never surprised.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Probing Telepathy
entries: If a creature communicates telepathically with the <$name$>, the <$name$> learns the creature's greatest desires if the <$name$> can see the creature.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Protection from {damage_type}
entries: Immune to {type} damage

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Provoke
entries: When <$name$> attacks, it may bonus action to get all creatures within striking range to spend their reaction to attack it at disadvantage unless they make a Wisdom {@dc 14} saving throw. Any creature that attacks <$name$> may be attacked at advantage until the end of the turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Quick Draw
entries: The <$name$> can switch between wielding its weapons as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Quickened Spell
entries: (3/Day). When it casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, it can changes the casting time to 1 bonus action for that casting.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Raided
entries: If one of your creatures attacked on your last turn, a Raided effect on one of your cards triggers this turn. Only the first Raided effect on a turn triggers; any further Raided effects do nothing.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Rally
entries: Your creatures with Rally have their associated effects triggered whenever you bring a creature with the Ally subtype into play.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Rampage, mtg
entries: <$name$> gains +1 to hit and damage on melee attacks for each creature that it was attacked by, since its last turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Reach
entries: <$name$> threatens all squares within an additional 5ft.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head the <$name$> has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Reactive Strike
entries: When the <$name$> takes 10 damage or more from a single hit, it immediately uses its {specific attack/trait}

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Reinforce
entries: <$name$> can as an action sacrifice itself to heal target creature {@dice 6d8} hit points, and grant them advantage on their next turn's attacks or abilities checks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: When <$name$>'s body is destroyed, its soul lingers. After {@dice 1d6} days it returns to life, if its body was destroyed the soul inhabits and animates another corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a wish spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Resilient
entries: A <$name$> has tactical advantage on all saving throws.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Retainer
entries: <$name$> is a Retainer, as described in {@book Strongholds and Followers|SaF 3pp|8|Retainers}

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Runner
entries: When using a dash action, the <$name$> moves three times its speed instead of twice.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Running Leap
entries: With a 10-foot running start, the <$name$> can long jump up to {25} feet.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Saga
entries: When you play a Saga, the first chapter's effects are triggered. At the start of each of your turns, the next chapter's effects are triggered. A Saga is Destroyed at the end of a turn in which its final chapter was triggered. Reinforcing a Saga triggers the current chapter but does not advance to the next chapter.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Shadow
entries: Immune to non magical weapons, and can pass through solid objects

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Shapechanger
entries: <$naam$> kan zijn actie gebruiken om te polymorphen in een {form} of terug in zijn ware gedaante. Zijn statistieken zijn hetzelfde in elke vorm. Uitrusting die hij draagt of bij zich draagt, wordt niet getransformeerd. Hij verandert niet van gedaante als hij sterft.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Siege
entries: The <$name$> deals double damage to objects and structures made of wood or lighter materials.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Simulacra
entries: When a simulacrum drops to O hit points or is subjected to a successful dispel magic spell (DC 17), it reverts to its constructed components.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Skulk
entries: Can {@action evade} as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Slow and Purposeful
entries: The <$name$> can't use the Dash action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, the <$name$> deals an extra 6 ({@damage 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the <$name$> that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the <$name$> doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Snowy Stealth
entries: While in a snowy environment, the <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide, and it can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: The <$name$> has {#} sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points to gain one of the following benefts:

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Spell Storing
entries: A spellcaster who wears the <$name$>'s amulet can cause the <$name$> to store one spell of 4th level or lower. To do so, the wearer must cast the spell on the <$name$>. The spell has no effect but is stored within the <$name$>. When commanded to do so by the wearer or when a situation arises that was predefined by the spellcaster, the <$name$> casts the stored spell with any parameters set by the original caster, requiring no components. When the spell is cast or a new spell is stored, any previously stored spell is lost.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Spell-Slayer
entries: When <$name$> hits a spellcaster with a weapon attack, the creature takes an extra <number> ({@damage }) damage of the weapon's type.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Spellcasting
entries: <$name$> is {level} level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is {ability} (Spell Save {@dc <#>, +<#> to hit with spell attacks. The Creature knows the following spells:

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Springing Charge
entries: If the <$name$> uses its action to dash and moves in a straight line directly toward a creature, it may make a single slam attack with advantage against <$name$> as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The <$name$>'s long jump is up to {20} feet and its high jump is up to {10} feet, with or without a running start.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Starshine
entries: The <$name$> can choose to generate an aura of bright light in a 20-foot radius around it and dim light in another 20-foot radius beyond that. It can toggle this aura as a bonus action. Also, it can cast the light cantrip. These light sources count as natural sunlight. A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the <$name$> must make a {@dc 19} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the <$name$>'s Starshine for the next 24 hours.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Startling Speed
entries: The movements of a <$name$> are so swift that it is almost {@condition invisible} when in motion. If the quickstep moves at least 30 feet on its turn, attack rolls against it have disadvantage until the start of its next turn unless the <$name$> is {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition restrained}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Steady Aim
entries: The <$name$> attacks ignore half and three quarters cover and deal an additional 4 ({@dice 1d8}) damage (included in the attack).

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Steady Aim (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> takes careful aim at a creature it can see within range of its ranged weapon. Until the end of its turn, the <$name$> deals an an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage with each of its ranged weapon attacks against the target.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Stealthy
entries: On each of its turns, the <$name$> can use a bonus action to take the Hide action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Stealthy Traveler
entries: The <$name$> can use Stealth while traveling at a normal pace.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Storm {@recharge 4}
entries: As twin spell, but with no loss of spell slots.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Storm Shield
entries: Ranged attacks targeting the <$name$> are always made with disadvantage and cannot gain advantage from any source.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Strangling
entries: As a bonus action, a <$name$> can strangle one creature that was already {@condition grappled} at the start of the <$name$> turn. The <$name$> drags the {@condition grappled} creature underwater and wraps {@dice 1d6} additional fronds around the target, which becomes {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained}. The DC to escape from this grapple equals 10 plus 2 per frond restraining the creature. A {@condition restrained} creature takes 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns, and it can also be targeted by frond attacks. <$name$> have AC 10 and can be severed individually by 4 slashing damage each.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Strength in Numbers
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Strength and Constitution checks and saving throws.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Stunning Pounce
entries: If the <$name$> moves at least 30 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition stunned} until the end of the <$name$>'s next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sturdy
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition paralyzed} or {@condition stunned}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Summon Sea Creatures (1/Day)
entries: All <$name$> (those with 50 or more hit points) have the ability to summon sea creatures as an action. Roll {@dice 2d6}: one die indicates how many rounds later the creatures arrive, and the other determines what type of creatures respond.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sun Sickness
entries: While in sunlight, the <$name$> has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The <$name$> dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sunlight Aversion
entries: While in natural sunlight (a daylight spell does not suffice), the <$name$> has disadvantage on attack rolls, saving throws and ability checks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sunlight Banishment
entries: If the <$name$> starts its turn in sunlight, it is transported to the Ethereal Plane. While sunlight shines on the spot from which it vanished, the <$name$> must remain in the Deep Ethereal. After sunset, it returns to the Border Ethereal at the same spot, whereupon it typically sets out to find its pack or its master. The <$name$> is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, but it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane. Once it is adjacent to its master or a pack mate that is on the Material Plane, a <$name$> in the Border Ethereal can return to the Material Plane as an action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
entries: The <$name$> takes 5 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sunlight Vulnerability
entries: <$name$>, that is exposed to natural sunlight (not just a daylight spell or similar magic) instantly dies, dissolving in a hissing, bubbling puddle of flesh.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Superior Attunement
entries: <$name$> can attune to four magic items maximum, instead of three.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Suppressed Power
entries: The <$name$> is unable to use its {trait/attack} while it is above half of its maximum hit points ({#}).

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the <$name$> surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage from the attack.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Surveil
entries: Look at the top four cards of your library, and choose any number up to the number beside the Surveil keyword. Those cards are discarded, and the rest return to your library.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Survivor
entries: The <$name$> gains 10 temporary hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point but fewer hit points than half its hit point maximum.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Swallow
entries: A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}. It takes 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage automatically at the start of each of the <$name$>'s turns. Only one Medium creature or two Small creatures can be inside the <$name$> at one time. A swallowed creature is unaffected by anything happening outside the <$name$> or by attacks from outside it. A swallowed creature can get out of the <$name$> by winning a Strength {@skill Athletics} contest against it, the swallowed character has tactical disadvantage in this contest or by using 5 feet of movement after the giant clam is dead.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Swamp Stride
entries: <$name$> can move across mud, muck, shallow water, and any other difficult terrain that arises from the presence of water without penalty.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Swampwalk
entries: <$name$> suffer no movement penalties in marshy terrain.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Swarm
entries: The <$name$> can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a <$name$>. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Swarming
entries: Up to {#} <$name$> can share the same space at the same time. The <$name$> has advantage on melee attack rolls if it is sharing its space with another <$name$> that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Talented Alchemist
entries: The <$name$> has proficiency with alchemist's supplies and its proficiency bonus is doubled for ability checks it makes using them.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Tamed
entries: The <$name$> never willingly attacks any reptilian humanoid, and if forced or magically compelled to do so it suffers disadvantage on attack rolls. Up to three Medium or one Large creatures can ride the <$name$>. This trait disappears if the <$name$> spends a month away from any reptilian humanoid.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: While <$name$> is on the same plane of existence as its master/bonded, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically with each other.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Telepathic Shroud
entries: The <$name$> is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts without its consent. If the <$name$> is serving as a familiar, this trait is shared by its companion as long as its companion is wihtin 10 ft.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Thick Hide
entries: The <$name$>'s skin is thick and tough, granting it a +1 bonus to Armor Class. This bonus is already factored into the <$name$>'s AC.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Thorn Lurker
entries: The <$name$> can attempt to hide even when it is only lightly obscured by foliage. Additionally, the nekker can pass through nonmagical plants without being slowed by them and without taking damage from them if they have thorns, spines, or a similar hazard.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Threatening
entries: Creatures provoke an opportunity attack from the <$name$> when they move 5 feet or more while within the <$name$>'s reach, and if the <$name$> hits a creature with an opportunity attack, the target's speed is reduced to 0 until the end of the current turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Three-Headed
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Tomb Bound
entries: The <$name$> is bound to the area it defends. It can't move more than 100 feet from the place it is bound to protect.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Totem of the Bear
entries: Hostile creatures within 5 feet of the <$name$> that can see and hear it have disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than the <$name$>.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Totem of the Wolf (1/turn)
entries: When the <$name$> hits a Large or smaller creature with a melee weapon attack, it can choose to force the target to make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. The target falls {@condition prone} on a failed save.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Tough
entries: The <$name$> adds its Constitution modifier to its armor class.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Trait Mimicry
entries: As a bonus action, a <$name$> can take on 1 nonmagical physical trait, attack, or reaction of a beast or humanoid with a challenge rating equal to or less than its own that it has seen within the last week (see Trait Mimicry sidebar). It can have up to 5 such traits at a time, no more than two of which can be attacks. Each trait lasts until the <$name$> replaces it with another trait as a bonus action. If the <$name$> goes a week without exposure to a single beast or humanoid, it loses all of its traits and reverts back to its true form.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Trample
entries: If an attack by <$name$> drops an opponent to 0 hp, <$name$>'s may make another attack to one of its allies within 10ft of it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Trample Over
entries: As the <$name$> moves, it can enter spaces occupied by enemies up to Large size. Creatures in spaces the <$name$> enters can attempt {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throws. On a failed save, the creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}; on a successful save, the creature moves 5 feet out of the <$name$>'s path and can make an opportunity attack if it's allowed to react. A <$name$> can attempt to trample any number of creatures during its move, but it can't trample the same creature more than once per round and it can't end its movement in another creature's space.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the <$name$> moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the <$name$> can make another attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Transparent
entries: Even when the <$name$> is in plain sight, it takes a successful {@dc 15} Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check to spot a <$name$> that has neither moved nor attacked. A creature that tries to enter the <$name$>'s space while unaware of the <$name$> is surprised by the <$name$>.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Trap
entries: The specified number of normal Gems become Trap Gems associated with this card. When your opponent destroys one of your Trap Gems, its associated ability is triggered. If you match one of your Trap Gems which is caused by an ongoing effect, a new Gem becomes Trapped on your next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Traveler in Darkness
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Intelligence (Arcana) checks made to know about shadow roads and shadow magic spells or items.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Treasure
entries: Your effects which find Treasures bring the specified number of Treasure Tokens into play on your side. Once you have four Treasure tokens, one of your existing Treasure Tokens is reinforced rather than a new one being created. Matching your Treasure Token adds 3 mana to a random card in your hand. Matching your opponent's Treasure Token adds 2 mana to a random card in your hand, and 2 mana to a random card in your opponent's hand.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Tunneler
entries: The <$name$> can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a {10}-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Turning Defiance
entries: The <$name$> and any ghouls within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Twisted
entries: When the <$name$> attacks a creature from hiding, the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the <$name$> is wearing no armor and not wielding a shield, its AC equals 10 + its Dexterity modifier + its Wisdom modifier.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Unbroken Spirit
entries: When the <$name$> is reduced to 0 hit points or dies, the nearest ally of the <$name$> gains 10 temporary hit points and advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Uncontrollable
entries: The <$name$>'s movement is never impeded by difficult terrain, and its speed can't be reduced by spells or magical effects. It can't be {@condition restrained} (per the condition), and it escapes automatically from any nonmagical restraints (such as chains, entanglement, or grappling) by spending 5 feet of movement. Being underwater imposes no penalty on its movement or attacks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Undead Nature
entries: A <$name$> does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Undead Resistance
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against disease.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Underground Charge
entries: If the <$name$> moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature while underground, it can then make a horn attack as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Undergrowth
entries: An Undergrowth effect on a card occurs when a card with Undergrowth is played. Undergrowth effects are described in terms of a number, X, which is the number of creatures in your graveyard, up to a maximum of the number beside the Undergrowth keyword.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Undying
entries: When you would make a death saving throw, you can instead spring back to your feet with a burst of radiant energy. You immediately stand up (if you so choose), and you regain hit points equal to half your hit point maximum. All hostile creatures within 30 feet of you take 10 + your Charisma modifier radiant damage and are blinded until the end of your turn. [recharge 1]

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Undying Soul
entries: If the <$name$> is reduced to 0 hit points, it immediately makes a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw. lf it succeeds, it is instead reduced to 1 hit point. (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Unearth
entries: A creature with <$name$> revifies whenever its death save is over 15

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Unearthly Grace
entries: A <$name$> applies their Charisma modifier to all of her saving throws in place of the normal ability modifier.  or The <$name$>'s Charisma modifier is added to its armor class (included above).

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Unearthly Recovery
entries: When the <$name$> has fewer than {#} hit points, it can use a bonus action to regain {#} hit points. (Recharges after a Long Rest)

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Unflinching
entries: The <$name$>  is immune to being {@condition frightened} or {@condition charmed}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Ungodly Resistance
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against spells or other magical effects cast or created by a cleric or paladin.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Unholy Aura
entries: Unless <$name$> is {@condition incapacitated}, it and the undead creatures of its choice within 30 feet have advantage on saving throws against features that turn undead.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Unholy Fortitude
entries: <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against being turned.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Unleash {@recharge 4}
entries: <$name$> can fight with primal ferocity. On their turn, they can enter a babarian like rage as a bonus action. While raging, they gain the following benefits:

items: <$name$> have advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
When it makes a melee weapon attack using Strength, add its proficiency bonus to the damage roll.
<$name$> get resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
If its are able to cast spells, it can't cast them or concentrate on them while raging.

entries: The rage lasts for up to 1 minute. It ends early if <$name$> is knocked unconscious or if its turn ends and it hasn't attacked a hostile creature, or taken damage since its last turn. It can also end rage on as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Unlovely
entries: The skirmisher has disadvantage on Performance and Persuasion checks in interactions with <$name$>.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Unnatural Aura
entries: All animals, whether wild or domesticated, can sense the unnatural presence of <$name$> at a distance of 30 feet. They do not willingly approach nearer than that and panic if forced to do so, and they remain panicked as long as they are within that range unless a master makes a successful {@dc 15} Wisdom (Animal Handling) check.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Unreliable
entries: At the start of each of its turns in combat, the automaton must succeed on a {@dc 8} Intelligence saving throw, or it does not move or take any actions during its turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Uplift Aura
entries: All allies within 30 feet gain +{#} on Intelligence checks, skill checks, and saving throws.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Vanishing
entries: creature only has temporary hit points

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Variable Illumination
entries: The <$name$> sheds bright light in a 5- to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius. The <$name$> can alter the radius as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Vengeful Tracker
entries: <$name$> knows the distance to and direction of any creature against which it seeks revenge, even if the target creature and this one are on different planes of existence. If the creature being tracked by <$name$> dies, it knows.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Vigilance
entries: <$name$> can use a reaction action each turn, not just once between its turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Vigilant
entries: The <$name$> can't be surprised.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Void Traveler
entries: The <$name$> requires no air, warmth, ambient pressure, food, or water, enabling it to travel safely through interstellar space and similar voids.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Vulnerability to Sunlight
entries: A <$name$> takes 1 point of radiant damage for every minute it is exposed to sunlight.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Vulnerability to Sunlight (Severe)
entries: A <$name$> takes 1 point of Constitution damage for every hour it is exposed to sunlight, and it dies if its Constitution score reaches 0. Lost Constitution points are recovered at the rate of 1/Day spent underground or otherwise sheltered from the sun.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Vulnerability to Water
entries: For every 5 feet the <$name$> moves while touching water or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) cold damage. An <$name$> completely immersed in water takes 10 ({@damage 4d4}) cold damage at the start of its turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Wakeful
entries: <$name$> is never found sleeping naturally. While the creature sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Wasteland Stride
entries: The <$name$> can use it to sink into and appear out of any sandy or rocky ground, and the range is only 30 ft. Using this ability replaces the <$name$>'s usual movement.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Wasteland Walk
entries: The <$name$> ignores difficult terrain caused by sand, gravel, or rocks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Water Bound
entries: The <$name$> cannot willingly leave the body of water to which it is bound. If forcibly removed, the <$name$> takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage every minute until it returns.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Water Camouflage
entries: An <$name$> has tactical advantage on {@skill Stealth} checks when it has any type of standing water to blend into.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Water Dependency
entries: <$name$> can survive out of water for <amount of time>. After that, they begin suffocating.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Water Form
entries: <$name$> can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Water Mastery
entries: A <$name$> has advantage on attack rolls if both it and its opponent are in water. If the opponent and the <$name$> are both on dry ground, the <$name$> has disadvantage on attack rolls.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 5 feet the <$name$> moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Weakly Armored
entries: Whenever the <$name$> takes more than {#} damage in a single turn, a piece of its armor chips off, reducing their AC by 1. This reduction is cumulative, but cannot reduce their AC below 10.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Weapon Mastery
entries: When the <$name$> hits with a melee weapon, it deals one extra die of the weapon's damage, plus an additional {#} damage (included in the attack).

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Weight of Wings
entries: A creature in a space occupied by the <$name$> has its speed reduced by half, and must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or become {@condition blinded}. Both effects end when the creature doesn't share a space with the swarm at the end of the creature's turn. If a creature succeeds on the saving throw, it is immune to the swarm's blindness (but not the speed reduction) for 24 hours.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Whirling Winds
entries: Gale-force winds rage around the <$name$>, making it immune to ranged weapon attacks except for those from siege weapons.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Whispers of Loss
entries: As a bonus action <$name$> whispers to a creature within {60} feet of losses, past, present or future, real or imagined. If the target creature understands the <$name$>, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw or become {@condition stunned} for one minute. At the end of each of its turns a creature may repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Wild Magic Surge
entries: When the creature casts a spell of 1st-level or higher, it rolls twice on the Wild Magic Surge Table (PHB pg. 104) and uses either number.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Wind Barrier
entries: A barrier of strong wind surrounds the <$name$> in a 10-foot radius around it. The strong wind keeps fog, smoke, and other gases at bay. Small or smaller flying creatures or Objects can't pass through the wall. Loose, lightweight materials brought into the wall fly upward. Arrows, bolts, and other ordinary projectiles launched at the amatsu are deflected upward and automatically miss. (Magic arrows, boulders hurled by Giants or siege engines, and similar projectiles, are unaffected.) Creatures in Gaseous Form can't pass through the barrier.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Winter Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide while in snowy and icy terrain.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Withdraw
entries: Instead of moving, <$name$> can withdraw into its <armored shell>. When it does so, it falls {@condition prone}. <$name$> has an AC of <number> until the start of its next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Wither
entries: Its successful attacks deals its damage to MAX hit points

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Wither, Superior
entries: Upon a successful attack <$name$> additionally deals d4 Ability damage to either Strength, or Constitution (which ever is largest)

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Withered Tresses
entries: If a <$name$> is kept out of water for 24 consecutive hours, its hair and body dry into desiccated swamp weeds and the creature is utterly destroyed.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Withering Miasma
entries: A creature that starts its turn in <$name$>'s space must make a successful {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage and its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Woad War Paint
entries: When <$name$> is reduced to 0 hit points, reduces a hostile creature to 0 hit points or scores a critical hit, it generates 1 shared legendary action for the Garden of Badb (see Garden of Badb sidebar).

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Woodfriend
entries: When in a forest, <$name$> leave no tracks and automatically discern true north.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Woodland Camouflage
entries: <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks while in the forest

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Woodland Stalker
entries: <$name$> can attempt to hide even when only lightly obscured by foliage as a bonus action on each of its turns.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Wounded Fury
entries: While it has {#} hit points or fewer, <$name$> has advantage on attack rolls. In addition, it deals an extra {#} ({@damage }) {Damage type} damage to any target it hits with a melee attack.
